byline.contributor: David Barstow contributed reporting, and Kitty Bennett contributed research.
byline.original: By STEVE EDER and PATRICIA COHEN

abstract: More calls are issued for Donald J Trump to release his tax returns, in wake of exchange with Hillary Clinton during first presidential debate suggesting that he pays no federal income taxes; little is known about his recent income taxes, but it would be remarkable if someone as wealthy as Trump paid no federal taxes at all.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump’s refusal to release his tax returns allowed Hillary Clinton to suggest at the debate that perhaps he has not paid income taxes.
snippet: Mr. Trump’s refusal to release his tax returns allowed Hillary Clinton to suggest at the debate that perhaps he has not paid income taxes....

headline.main: Does Donald Trump Pay Taxes? Here’s What We Know
headline.print_headline: After Comments About Taxes, New Clamor to Show Returns
